sentences.english: When I go dhave the long steep Road of Darkness.
sentences.chinese: 当我行走在黑暗而险峻的路上。

sentences.english: BOLD】Climbing the steep mountain is a bold act.
sentences.chinese: 爬那座险峻的山是大胆的行为。

sentences.english: Under the bridge, there lies a valley between steep mountains with a rapid stream flowing through it.
sentences.chinese: 两端之间，原隔着险峻的山谷，湍急的溪流。

sentences.english: But this defense of faith faces a steep hurdle.
sentences.chinese: 但是捍卫信仰面临着一道险峻的屏障。
某一地方相当是险峻的。

sentences.english: Mountain Kunyu ranges rise and fall, with high and precipitous terrain.
sentences.chinese: 昆嵛山在高和险峻地形里起伏不断。

sentences.english: Years ago, local villagers could only descend the village’s mountain on a dangerous path.
sentences.chinese: 多年前，郭亮村村民只能从一个崎岖险峻的小径下山。

sentences.english: Fan Cliff extremely steep peak, only the southwest corner before climbing with ropes from the top.
sentences.chinese: 扇子崖峰极险峻，唯借助绳索自西南隅方可攀巅。

sentences.english: The next day, dangerous Tiger Leaping Gorge, Interview with the Tibetan family.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，险峻的虎跳峡，夜访藏家。

sentences.english: When love  beckons to you, follow him, though his ways are hard and steep.
sentences.chinese: 当爱召唤你时，请追随她，尽管爱的道路艰难险峻。

sentences.english: The high place precipice like truncates, steep precipitous.
sentences.chinese: 高处绝壁如削，陡峭险峻。

sentences.english: Simatai Great Wall is the most dangerous part of the whole Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 司马台是长城中最险峻的地方。

sentences.english: Rudolf was rounding a bleak, dangerous cape .
sentences.chinese: 鲁道夫正在绕过一个荒凉险峻的海岬。

sentences.english: The severity of mountainous terrain becomes clearer as you start climbing.
sentences.chinese: 努力攀登，视野中的险峻山势就会越来越清晰。

sentences.english: There is only one narrow passageway up the steep mountain.
sentences.chinese: 那座险峻的山上只有一条羊肠小道。

sentences.english: When love beckons to you, follow him, though his ways are hard and steep .
sentences.chinese: 党爱召唤你时，跟随他，哪怕爱的道路艰难又险峻。

definition: strategically situated and easy to defend/strategic location
topography of a mountain/features of a mountain
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
